images.copyright: The Subway slot canyon in Zion National Park, Utah (© Stan Moniz/Tandem Stills + Motion)
images.title: Celebrating Zion's birthday
images.caption: Zion National Park, Utah
images.desc: Today, we're celebrating the 102nd anniversary of southwest Utah's Zion National Park with a visit to its Subway slot canyon. Zion is defined by its breathtakingly steep red cliffs, its maze of sandstone canyons, and its waterfalls with colorful hanging gardens. Visitors here can trek for miles, ducking into crevices and resting in canyons once occupied by the Ancestral Puebloans.
